package org.javaro.lecture; import org.javaro.lecture.*; public class MainProg { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub AirPlane ap = new AirPlane(); ap.setAirplaneName("대한 항공"); Ticketer ticketer1 = new Ticketer(); Ticketer ticketer2 = new Ticketer(); Ticketer ticketer3 = new Ticketer(); ticketer1.setName("고길동"); ticketer2.setName("둘리"); ticketer3.setName("또치"); TicketManagement TM = new TicketManagement(); System.out.println("소형비행기 예매 시스템"); System.out.println(); System.out.println("좌석 현황"); TM.PrintAll(ap); System.out.println(); TM.reservation(ap, ticketer1, "제주"); TM.reservation(ap, ticketer2, "제주"); TM.reservation(ap, ticketer3, "제주"); System.out.println(); System.out.println("좌석 현황"); TM.PrintAll(ap); System.out.println(); TM.cancelReservation(ap, ticketer1); System.out.println(""); System.out.println("좌석 현황"); TM.PrintAll(ap); System.out.println("---리포트 종료---"); TM.arrive(ticketer2); TM.arrive(ticketer3); } }
